fluff.name: Guerrer
entries: A human in clanging plate armor holds her shield before her as she runs toward the massed goblins. An elf behind her, clad in studded leather armor, peppers the goblins with arrows loosed from his exquisite bow. The half-orc nearby shouts orders, helping the two combatants coordinate their assault to the best advantage.

A dwarf in chain mail interposes his shield between the ogre's club and his companion, knocking the deadly blow aside. His companion, a half-elf in scale armor, swings two scimitars in a blinding whirl as she circles the ogre, looking for a blind spot in its defenses.

A gladiator fights for sport in an arena, a master with his trident and net, skilled at toppling foes and moving them around for the crowd's delight—and his own tactical advantage. His opponent's sword flares with blue light an instant before she sends lightning flashing forth to smite him.

All of these heroes are fighters, perhaps the most diverse class of characters in the worlds of Dungeons & Dragons. Questing knights, conquering overlords, royal champions, elite foot soldiers, hardened mercenaries, and bandit kings—as fighters, they all share an unparalleled mastery with weapons and armor, and a thorough knowledge of the skills of combat. And they are well acquainted with death, both meting it out and staring it defiantly in the face.

entries.name: Well-Rounded Specialists
entries: Fighters learn the basics of all combat styles. Every fighter can swing an axe, fence with a rapier, wield a longsword or a greatsword, use a bow, and even trap foes in a net with some degree of skill. Likewise, a fighter is adept with shields and every form of armor. Beyond that basic degree of familiarity, each fighter specializes in a certain style of combat. Some concentrate on archery, some on fighting with two weapons at once, and some on augmenting their martial skills with magic. This combination of broad general ability and extensive specialization makes fighters superior combatants on battlefields and in dungeons alike.

entries.name: Trained for Danger
entries: Not every member of the city watch, the village militia, or the queen's army is a fighter. Most of these troops are relatively untrained soldiers with only the most basic combat knowledge. Veteran soldiers, military officers, trained bodyguards, dedicated knights, and similar figures are fighters.

Some fighters feel drawn to use their training as adventurers. The dungeon delving, monster slaying, and other dangerous work common among adventurers is second nature for a fighter, not all that different from the life he or she left behind. There are greater risks, perhaps, but also much greater rewards—few fighters in the city watch have the opportunity to discover a magic flame tongue sword, for example.

entries.name: Creating a Guerrer
entries: As you build your fighter, think about two related elements of your character's background: Where did you get your combat training, and what set you apart from the mundane warriors around you? Were you particularly ruthless? Did you get extra help from a mentor, perhaps because of your exceptional dedication? What drove you to this training in the first place? A threat to your homeland, a thirst for revenge, or a need to prove yourself might all have been factors.

You might have enjoyed formal training in a noble's army or in a local militia. Perhaps you trained in a war academy, learning strategy, tactics, and military history. Or you might be self-taught—unpolished but well tested. Did you take up the sword as a way to escape the limits of life on a farm, or are you following a proud family tradition? Where did you acquire your weapons and armor? They might have been military issue or family heirlooms, or perhaps you scrimped and saved for years to buy them. Your armaments are now among your most important possessions—the only things that stand between you and death's embrace.

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a fighter quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Força or Destresa your highest ability score, depending on whether you want to focus on melee weapons or on archery (or finesse weapons). Your next-highest score should be Constitució, or Intel·ligència if you plan to adopt the Cavaller Èldritx arquetip marcial. Second, choose the {@background soldier} background.
Let me know when you're all done talking.

Of all the adventurers in the worlds of D&D, the fighter is perhaps the greatest paradox. On the one hand, a singular feature of the class is that no two fighters ply their craft in quite the same way; their weapons, armor, and tactics differ across a vast spectrum. On the other hand, regardless of the tools and methods one uses, at the heart of every fighter's motivation lies the same basic truth: it is better to wound than to be wounded.

Although some adventuring fighters risk their lives fighting for glory or treasure, others are primarily concerned with the welfare of others. They put more value on the well-being of the society, the village, or the group than on their own safety. Even if there's gold in the offing, the true reward for most fighters comes from sending enemies to their doom.
The sections below offer ways to add a little depth and a few personal touches to your fighter character.

entries.name: Heraldic Sign
entries: Fighters typically do battle for a cause. Some fight on behalf of kingdoms besieged by monsters, while others quest only for personal glory. In either case, a fighter often displays a heraldic sign that represents that cause, either adopting the symbol of a nation or a royal line, or creating a crest to represent one's self-interest.

Your character could be affiliated with an organization or a cause, and thus might already travel under a banner of some sort. If that's not the case, consider devising a heraldic sign that symbolizes an aspect of your nature or speaks to what you see as your purpose in the world.

entries.caption: Heraldic Signs
rows: A rampant golden dragon on a green field, representing valor and a quest for wealth
The fist of a storm giant clutching lightning before a storm cloud, symbolizing wrath and power
Crossed greatswords in front of a castle gate, signifying the defense of a city or kingdom
A skull with a dagger through it, representing the doom you bring to your enemies
A phoenix in a ring of fire, an expression of an indomable spirit
Three drops of blood beneath a horizontal sword blade on a black background, symbolizing three foes you have sworn to kill

entries.name: Instructor
entries: Some fighters are natural-born combatants who have a talent for surviving in battle. Others learned the basics of their combat prowess in their formative years from spending time in a military or some other martial organization, when they were taught by the leaders of the group.

A third type of fighter comes from the ranks of those who received one-on-one instruction from an accomplished veteran of the craft. That instructor was, or perhaps still is, well versed in a certain aspect of combat that relates to the student's background.

If you decide that your character had an individual instructor, what is that person's specialty? Do you emulate your instructor in how you fight, or did you take the instructor's teachings and adapt them to your own purposes?

entries.caption: Instructor
rows: Gladiator. Your instructor was a slave who fought for freedom in the arena, or one who willingly chose the gladiator's life to earn money and fame.
Military. Your trainer served with a group of soldiers and knows much about working as a team.
City Watch. Crowd control and peacekeeping are your instructor's specialties.
Tribal Warrior. Your instructor grew up in a tribe, where fighting for one's life was practically an everyday occurrence.
Street Fighter. Your trainer excels at urban combat, combining close-quarters work with silence and efficiency.
Weapon Master. Your mentor helped you to become one with your chosen weapon, by imparting highly specialized knowledge of how to wield it most effectively.

entries.name: Style
entries: Many fighters distinguish themselves from their peers by adopting and perfecting a particular style or method of waging combat. Although this style might be a natural outgrowth of a fighter's personality, that's not always the case—someone's approach to the world in general does not necessarily dictate how that person operates when lives are on the line.
Do you have a combat style that mirrors your outlook on life, or is something else inside you unleashed when weapons are drawn?

entries.caption: Style
rows: Elegant. You move with precise grace and total control, never using more energy than you need.
Brutal. Your attacks rain down like hammer blows, meant to splinter bone or send blood flying.
Cunning. You dart in to attack at just the right moment and use small-scale tactics to tilt the odds in your favor.
Effortless. You rarely perspire or display anything other than a stoic expression in battle.
Energetic. You sing and laugh during combat as your spirit soars. You are happiest when you have a foe in front of you and a weapon in hand.
Sinister. You scowl and sneer while fighting, and you enjoy mocking your foes as you defeat them.

classFeature.name: Estil de Lluita
entries: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Escull una de les opcions següents:. You can't take the same Estil de Lluita option more than once, even if you get to choose again.

classFeature.name: Maneuver Versatility
entries: {@i tret de nivell 1 (millora Maniobres)}

If you know any maniobres from the fighter's Battle Master archetype, you can replace one maneuver you know with a different maneuver quan acabis un Descans Llarg. This change reflects your physical and mental preparation for the day ahead.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i tret de nivell 1 (millora Estil de Lluita)}

Whenever you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another style available to your class. This change represents a shift of focus in your martial training and practice, causing you to lose the benefits of one style and gain the benefits of another style.

classFeature.name: Descans Instantani
entries: Tens una reserva d'energia limitada que pots usar per protegir-te del dany. En el teu torn, pots, com a acció bonus, recuperer {@dice 1d10} + el teu nivell de guerrer de punts de vida.
Un cop empris aquest tret no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

classFeature.name: Acció Súbita
entries: Començant a nivell 2, pots sobrepassar els teus límits durant un moment. En el teu torn, pots prendre una acció adicional.

Un cop empris aquest tret no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg. Començant a nivell 17, pots emprar aquest tret 2 cops abans d'haver de descansar; però només un cop cada el mateix torn.

classFeature.name: Arquetip Marcial
entries: A nivell 3, tries un arquetip que empres per emular durant el combat. Escull de la llista següent. L'arquetip t'otorga trets als nivells 3, 7, 10, 15, i 18.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls una {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel guerrer a nivell 4}
Quan arribes a un nivell amb aquesta classe que et doni el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica, pots fer una de les coses següents que signifiquen un canvi en la teva disciplina marcial:

items: Substituir un {@filter Estil de Lluita|optionalfeatures|feature type=FS:F} que coneguis per un altre Estil de Lluita disponible per als guerrers.
Si coneixes {@filter maniobres|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV:B} de l'arquetip {@class guerrer|phb|Mestre de Batalla|Battle Master|phb|2-0}, en pots substituir una per una altra de diferent.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.
Quan arribes a nivell 11 en aquesta classe pots atacar 3 cops. Quan arribes a nivell 20 en aquesta classe pots atacar 4 cops.

Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

entries: Començant a nivell 9, si falles una salvada, la pots tornar a tirar i acceptar el nou resultat. No pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.
A nivell 13 pots emprar aquest tret 2 cops abans de necessitar un Descans Llarg. A nivell 17, pots emprar aquest tret 3 cops abans de necessitar un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Atac Extra (3)
entries: A nivell 20, pots atacar 4 cops (i no 1) quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Cavaller d'Eco
entries: A mysterious and feared frontline warrior of the Kryn Dynasty, the Cavaller d'Eco has mastered the art of using dunamis to summon the fading shades of unrealized timelines to aid them in battle. Surrounded by echoes of their own might, they charge into the fray as a cycling swarm of shadows and strikes.

subclassFeature.name: Manifestar Eco
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller d'Eco a nivell 3}

Pots, com a acció bonus, manifestar un eco màgic de tu en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 15 peus de tu. Quest eco és màgic, translúcid, gris, i s'assembla a tu fins que: es destruixi; fins que el dissipis com a acció bonus; manifestis un altre eco; o et quedis {@condition incapacitated}.

L'eco té: una CA de AC 14 + el teu bonus de competència; 1 punt de vida; i immunitat a totes les condicions. Si ha de salvar, empra els teus bonus de salvades. Té el teu tamany i ocupa un espai. En el teu torn, pots donar-li una ordre mental per moure'l 30 peus en qualsevol direcció (no requereix acció). Si el teu eco està a més de 30 peus de tu al final del teu torn, és destruït.
Pots usar l'eco de diferents maneres:

items: Com a acció bonus, pots gastar 15 peus de moviment i canviar-te de lloc amb el teu eco; podeu estar a qualsevol distància l'un de l'altre.
Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn, tot atac pot sortir o del teu espai o de l'espai de l'eco (escull a cada atac).
Quan una criatura que puguis veure a 5 peus del teu eco se n'allunya com a mínim 5 peus pots, com a reacció, fer un atac d'oportunitat com si fossis a l'espai de l'eco.

subclassFeature.name: Alliberar Encarnació
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller d'Eco a nivell 3}
Pots augmentar la furia del teu eco. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, pots fer un atac cos a cos extra des de la posició del teu eco.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Avatar de l'Eco
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller d'Eco a nivell 7}

Pots transferir la teva consciència temporalment al teu eco. Com a acció, pots veure i sentir a través dels sentits de l'eco. Mentre ho facis et consideres {@condition deafened} i {@condition blinded}. Pots mantenir aquest efecte durant 10 minuts i acabar-lo quan vulguis (no requereix acció). Mentre usis el teu eco així pot estar fins a 1,000 peus de tu sense que es destrueixi.

subclassFeature.name: Màrtir d'Ombres
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller d'Eco a nivell 10}

Pots fer que el teu eco s'interposi entre l'atac que designi a una altra criatura que puguis veure. Abans que es faci la tirada d'impacte pots, com a reacció, teleportar l'eco en un espai desocupat a 5 peus de la criatura objectiu. Llavors la tirada d'impacte detonant designa al teu eco com a objectiu.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Recuperar Potencial
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller d'Eco a nivell 15}

Has après a absorbir la màgia efímera del teu eco. Quan un eco teu es destrueixi degut a dany, pots guanyar {@dice 2d6} + el teu modificador de Constitució de punts de vida temporals, sempre que no en tinguis ja.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Ser Legió
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller d'Eco a nivell 18}
Pots, com a acció bonus, crear dos ecos amb el tret Manifestar Eco alhora. Si proves de crear-ne un tercer, els dos previs es destrueixen. Pots usar a qualsevol dels dos com sempre.
A més, quan tires iniciativa i no et queden usos d'Alliberar Encarnació, en recuperes un ús.

subclassFeature.name: Mestre de Batalla
entries: Those who emulate the archetypal Battle Master employ martial techniques passed down through generations. To a Battle Master, combat is an academic field, sometimes including subjects beyond battle such as weaponsmithing and calligraphy. Not every fighter absorbs the lessons of history, theory, and artistry that are reflected in the Battle Master archetype, but those who do are well-rounded fighters of great skill and knowledge.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, aprèns maniobres que empren daus especials anomenats daus de superioritat.

entries.name: Maniobres
entries: Aprèns 3 maniobres (escull-les), de la llista "Maniobres". La majoria milloren els atacs d'alguna forma. Només pots emprar 1 maniobra per atac.
Aprèns 2 maniobres més (escull-les) als nivells 7, 10, i 15. Quan n'aprèns de noves també pots substituir-ne una que coneguis per una altra.

entries.name: Daus de superioritat
entries: Tens 4 daus de superioritat, que són {@dice d8}s. Un dau de superioritat is expended es gasta quan l'empres. Recuperes tots els daus de superioritat quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
Obténs un altres dau de superioritat a nivell 7, i encara un altre a nivell 15.

entries.name: Tirades de salvació
entries: Certes maniobres forcen a l'objectiu a salvar per a resistir-ne l'efecte. La CD de salvació es calcula així:

subclassFeature.name: Opcions de Maniobra
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} pel guerrer a nivell 3}

Si tens accés a maniobres, tens, a més, aquestes disponibles. Les maniobres són accessibles pels Mestres de Batalla, però també per aquells que tenen un tret especial com ara l'Estil de Lluita {@optfeature Tècnica Superior|TCE} o bé la dot {@feat Martial Adept}.

subclassFeature.name: Opcions de Maniobra
entries: {@i tret de nivell 1 (millora Maniobres)}

If you have access to maniobres, the following maniobres are added to the list of options available to you. Maniobres are available to Battle Masters and to characters who have the {@optfeature Tècnica Superior|TCE} Estil de Lluita or the {@feat Martial Adept} feat.

subclassFeature.name: Maniobres
entries: Les maniobres estan en ordre alfabètic.

subclassFeature.name: Alumne de Guerra
entries: A nivell 3, tens competència amb un tipus d'{@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Maniobres Adicionals
entries: A nivell 7, aprèns 2 maniobres més (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Dau de superioritat adicional
entries: Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 7.

subclassFeature.name: Conèixer als Enemics
entries: Si passes 1 minut observant o interactuant amb una criatura fora del combat, aprèns informació sobre les seves capacitats en comparació amb les teves. El/la/li MM et dirà si la criatura és superior, inferior, o igual a tu respecte a 2 de les característiques següents (escull):

items: Puntuació de Força
Puntuació de Destresa
Puntuació de Constitució
Classe d'Armadura
Punts de vida actuals
Nivells de classe totals (si n'hi ha)
Nivells de guerrer (si n'hi ha)

subclassFeature.name: Maniobres Adicionals
entries: A nivell 10, aprèns 2 maniobres més (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada (d10)
entries: A nivell 10, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d10}s.

subclassFeature.name: Maniobres Adicionals
entries: A nivell 15, aprèns 2 maniobres més (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Dau de superioritat adicional
entries: Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 15.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable
entries: Començant a nivell 15, quan tires iniciativa i no et queden daus de superioritat, en recuperes 1.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada (d12)
entries: A nivell 18, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Campió
entries: The archetypal Champion focuses on the development of raw physical power honed to deadly perfection. Those who model themselves on this archetype combine rigorous training with physical excellence to deal devastating blows.

subclassFeature.name: Crític millorat
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, els teus impactes armats són crítics amb un 19 o amb un 20.

subclassFeature.name: Atleta Destacable
entries: Començant a nivell 7, afegeixes la meitat del teu bonus de competència (arrodonint a l'alça) a tota tirada de Força, Destresa, o Constitució check que no tingui ja el teu bonus de competència.
A més, quan fas un salt de llargada, saltes uns peus adicionals equivalents al teu modificador de Força.

subclassFeature.name: Estil de Lluita Adicional
entries: A nivell 10, esculls un segon Estil de Lluita dels d'aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Crític Superior
entries: Començant a nivell 15, els teus impactes armats són crítics amb un 18, un 19, o un 20.

subclassFeature.name: Sobreviure
entries: A nivell 18, you attain the pinnacle of resilience in battle. At the start of each of your turns, you regain punts de vida equal to 5 + el teu modificador de Constitució if you have no more than half of your punts de vida left. You don't gain this benefit if you have 0 punts de vida.

subclassFeature.name: Cavaller Èldritx
entries: The archetypal Cavaller Èldritx combines the martial mastery common to all fighters with a careful study of magic. Cavaller Èldritxs use magical techniques similar to those practiced by wizards. They focus their study on two of the eight schools of magic—abjuration and evocation. Abjuration spells grant an Cavaller Èldritx additional protection in battle, and evocation spells deal damage to many foes at once, extending the fighter's reach in combat. These knights learn a comparatively small number of spells, committing them to memory instead of keeping them in a spellbook.

subclassFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 3, millores la teva habilitat marcial amb l'habilitat de llançar conjurs. El {@book capítol 10|PHB|10} té les normes generals del llançament de conjurs i {@book capítol 11|PHB|11} té la {@filter llista de conjurs de mag|spells|class=wizard}.

entries.name: Trucs
entries: Aprèns 2 trucs (escull) de la {@filter llista de conjurs de mag|spells|class=wizard}. Aprèns un truc de mag extra (escull) a nivell 10.

entries.name: Ranures de Conjur
entries: La Taula de Llançament de Conjurs pel Cavaller Arcà Spellcasting mostra quantes ranures de conjur tens per a llançar els teus {@filter conjurs de mag|spells|class=wizard} de nivells 1 i superior. Per a llançar un conjur, has de gastar una ranura del nivell del conjur (o superior). Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Per exemple, si coneixes el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell escut} i tens dues ranures, una ranura de nivell 1 i una de nivell 2 disponible, pots llançar {@spell escut} gastant qualsevol de les dues ranures.

entries.name: Conjurs Coneguts de Nivells 1 i Superior
entries: Coneixes 3 conjurs de mag de nivell 1 (escull), que han de ser de les escoles d'abjuració i d'evocació i han de ser de la llista de conjurs de mag.

Aprèns més conjurs de mag de nivells 1 o superior quan pugis de nivell; consulta la Taula de Llançament de Conjurs de the Cavaller Èldritx. Cada conjur ha de ser d'abjuració o d'evocació (escull), i has de tenir ranures del nivell del conjur per poder aprendre'l. Així, quan arribes a nivell 7 en aquesta classe, pots aprendre un conjur de nivell 1 o de nivell 2.
Els conjurs que aprèns, però, als nivells 8, 14, i 20 poden ser de qualsevol escola de màgia.

Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, pots reemplaçar un dels conjurs de mag que coneguis per un de nou de la llista de conjurs de mag. Has de tenir ranures del nivell del nou conjur, i ha d'ésser un abjuration or evocation spell. aquestes restriccions no s'apliquen si el conjur que substitueixes és el que has après al nivells 3, 8, 14, o 20.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs de mag és l'Intel·ligència: has après els teus conjurs a través de l'estudi i la memorització. Faràs servir l'Intel·ligència quan un conjur parli de la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs. També faràs servir el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència quan un conjur de mag mencioni: o una CD de salvada o una tirada d'impactar.

subclassFeature.name: Vincle d'Arma
entries: A nivell 3, aprèns un ritual que crea un vincle màgic entre tu i una arma. El ritual dura 1 hora que pots fer durant un Descans Curt. Has de tenir l'arma a l'abast durant el ritual. Al final, la torques i en forges el vincle.

Un cop estigueu vinculats, no se't pot desarmar amb aquella arma si no et quedes {@condition incapacitated}. Si està al mateix pla d'existència, pots convocar l'arma com a acció bonus en el teu torn, i es teleportarà a la teva mà.
Pots tenir 2 armes vinculades però només en pots convocar una alhora amb una acció. Si proves de vincular una tercera arma, has de trencar el vincle amb una de les armes anteriors.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia de Guerra
entries: Començant a nivell 7, quan prèns l'acció llançant un truc, pots fer un atac armat com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Assalt Èldritx
entries: A nivell 10, aprèns a atacar amb armes per a debilitat a l'objectiu contra la teva màgia. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, aquesta salva amb desavantatge contra el teu proper conjur teu que l'afecti abans del final del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Càrrega Arcana
entries: A nivell 15, pots teleportar-te fins a 30 peus en un espai desocupat que puguis veure quen empris la teva Acció Súbita. Pots teleportar-te abans o després de prendre l'acció adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia de Guerra Millorada
entries: Començant a nivell 18, quan llances un conjur amb la teva acció  pots fer un atac armat com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Cavaller del Drac Lila (Banneret)
entries: Cavaller del Drac Lilas are warriors who hail from the kingdom of Cormyr. Pledged to protect the crown, they take the fight against evil beyond the kingdom's borders. They are tasked with wandering the land as knights errant, relying on their judgment, bravery, and fidelity to guide them in defeating evildoers.

A Cavaller del Drac Lila inspires greatness in others by committing brave deeds in battle. The mere presence of a knight in a hamlet is enough to cause some orcs and bandits to seek easier prey. A lone knight is a skilled warrior, but a knight leading a band of allies can transform even the most poorly equipped militia into a ferocious war band.
A knight prefers to lead through deeds, not words. As a knight spearheads an attack, the knight's actions can awaken reserves of courage and conviction in allies that they never suspected they had.

subclassFeature.name: Crit Invocador
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, aprèns a inspirar els teus aliats per a ignorar les seves ferides.
Quan empris el tret Descans Instantani, pots triar fins a 3 aliats a 60 peus que et puguin veure o sentir. Cadascuna rep el teu nivell de guerrer en punts de vida temporal.

subclassFeature.name: Restricció: Gentilpersona
entries: Els Cavallers del Drac Lilas estan lligats a una ordre Cormyrean.
Banneret és el nom genèric d'aquest arquetip i es pot canviar si es fa servir en altres escenaris.

subclassFeature.name: Enviat Reial
entries: Un Cavaller del Drac Lila és portaveu de la corona Cormyrean. Els cavallers més respectats s'espera que es portin amb elegància.

A nivell 7, tens competència en {@skill Persuasion}. Si ja hi ets competent, obténs competència en una de les habilitats següents (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, o {@skill Performance}.
El teu bonus de competència es suma 2 cops (i no 1) a les tirades de {@skill Persuasion}. Reps aquest benefici sigui sigui quina sigui la competència que rebis amb aquest tret.

subclassFeature.name: Inspiració Súbita
entries: Començant a nivell 10, quan empris el tret Acció Súbita, pots triar un aliat a 60 peus de tu que et pugui sentir o veure. Pot, com a reacció, fer un atac atac armat cos a cos o a distància.
Començant a nivell 18, pots triar 2 aliats.

subclassFeature.name: Baluard
entries: Començant a nivell 15, exténs el teu benefici del tret Indomable. Quan empres el tret Indomable per tornar a tirar una salvada d'Intel·ligència, Saviesa, o de carisma i no estàs {@condition incapacitated}, pots escollir un aliat a 60 peus que et puguis sentir o veure i que també hagi fallat la seva salvada contra el mateix efecte. La criatura pot tornar a tirar la seva salvada i acceptar el nou resultat.

subclassFeature.name: Inspiració Súbita
entries: Començant a nivell 18, pots escollir 2 aliats a 60 peus de tu en ves d'un.

subclassFeature.name: Guerrer Psi
entries: Awake to the poder psiònic within, a Psi Warrior is a fighter who augments their physical might with psi-infused weapon strikes, telekinetic lashes, and barriers of mental force. Many githyanki train to become such warriors, as do some of the most disciplined high elves. In the world of Eberron, many young kalashtar dream of becoming Psi Warriors.

As a Psi Warrior, you might have honed your psionic abilities through solo discipline, unlocked it under the tutelage of a master, or refined it at an academy dedicated to wielding the mind's power as both weapon and shield.

subclassFeature.name: Poder Psiònic
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer Psiònic a nivell 3}

Alguns poders teus gasten el Dau d'Energia Psiònica que empren (depen del poder), i no pots emprar un poder si et requereix emprar un dau i no te'n queda cap. Recuperes tots els Daus d'Energia Psiònica quan acabis un Descans Llarg. A més, com a acció bonus, pots recuperar un Dau d'Energia Psiònica gastat, però no pots tornar-hi a fer fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, el tamany dels Daus d'Energia Psiònica incrementa: a nivell 5 ({@dice d8}), a nivell 11 ({@dice d10}), i a nivell 17 ({@dice d12}).
Els poders següents empren Daus d'Energia Psiònica.

subclassFeature.name: Adepte Telequinètic
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer Psiònic a nivell 7}
Has après noves formes d'emprar els teus trets telequinètics; les formes són les següents.

subclassFeature.name: Ment Guarida
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer Psiònic a nivell 10}

L'energia psiònica que flueix dins teu t'empodera la ment. Tens The psionic energy flowing through you has bolstered your mind. Tens resistència al dany psíquic. A més, si comences el teu torn {@condition charmed} o bé {@condition frightened}, pots gastar un Dau d'Energia Psiònica i acabar tot efecte sobre tu que et tingui en aquestes condicions.

subclassFeature.name: Fortalesa de Força
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer Psiònic a nivell 15}

Pots guarir-te a tu i als altres amb força telekinètica. Com a acció bonus, tria el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència en criatures (mínim d'una). Les criatures elegibles són tu i les que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. Tot objectiu està protegit com si tingués mitja cobertura durant 1 minut o fins que et quedis {@condition incapacitated}.
Un cop prenguis aquesta acció bonus, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis un Dau d'Energia Psiònica per tornar a prendre-la.

subclassFeature.name: Mestratge Telekinètic
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer Psiònic a nivell 18}

La teva habilitat de moure criatures i objectes amb la ment no té rival. Pots llançar el conjur {@spell telequinesi} sense necessitar components; la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pel conjur és Intel·ligència. A cada torn teu mentre et concentris amb el conjur, inclòs el torn que el llances, pots fer un atac com a acció bonus.
Un cop llances el conjur amb aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis un Dau d'Energia Psiònica to cast it again.

subclassFeature.name: Guerrer de Runes
entries: Guerrer de Runess enhance their martial prowess using the supernatural power of runes, an ancient practice that originated with giants. Rune cutters can be found among any family of giants, and you likely learned your methods first or second hand from such a mystical artisan. Whether you found the giant's work carved into a hill or cave, learned of the runes from a sage, or met the giant in person, you studied the giant's craft and learned how to apply magic runes to empower your equipment.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 3}
Tens competència amb {@item smith's eines|PHB}, i aprèns a parlar, llegir, i escriure {@language Giant}.

subclassFeature.name: Poder Gegant
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 3}
Has après a acceptar el poder dels gegants. Com a acció bonus, obténs els beneficis següents durant 1 minut:

items: Si ets Mitjà o menor esdevéns Gran, juntament amb allò que vesteixis. Si no tens espai suficient, no canvies.
Tens avantatge a tirades i salvades de Força.
Un cop a cada torn teu, un dels teus atacs armats o desarmats pot fer un {@damage 1d6} de dany extra a un objectiu.

entries: Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Inscriure Runes
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 3}

Pots emprar runes màgiques per millorar el teu equipament. Aprèns 2 runes (escull) de les de la llista. Cada cop que pugis de client en aquesta classe en pots substituir una que coneguis per una de d'aquesta llista. La taula de Runes Conegudes indica a quins nivells aprèns noves runes.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, pots tocar tants objectes com runes coneixes i inscriure una runa diferent a cadascun. L'objecte ha de ser una arma, una armadura, un escut, bijuteria, o alguna cosa vestible o portable. La runa roman a l'objecte fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, i cada objecte només pot dur una de les teves runes alhora.

Les runes següents et són disponibles quqan aprenguis una runa. Si una runa té un requisit de nivell, l'has d'assolir per a aprendre-la. Si una runa involucra una salvació, la CD és 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador de Constitució.

entries.name: Runa de Turó (7th Level or Higher)
Runa de Tempesta (7th Level or Higher)

subclassFeature.name: Runa Coneguda Adicional
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 7}
Aprèns una Runa adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Escut Rúnic
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 7}

Aprèns a invocar màgia rúnica per a protegir els teus aliats. Quan una criatura (tu no) que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu és impactada pots, com a reacció, forçar a tornar a tirar la tirada d'impacte i acceptar el nou resultat.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Runa Coneguda Adicional
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 10}
Aprèns una Runa adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Gran Estatura
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 10}
La màgia de les runes t'altera permanentment. Quan rebis aquest tret creixes {@dice 3d4} polzades d'alçada.
A més, el dany extre del Poder Gegant es torna {@dice 1d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Runa Coneguda Adicional
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 15}
Aprèns una Runa adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Domini de Runes
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 15}
Pots invocar cada runa del tret Inscriure Runes dos cops (i no 1), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Juggernaut Rúnic
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 18}

Aprèns a amplificar la teva transformació rúnica. El dany del teu Poder Gegant es torna {@dice 1d10}. A més, amb aquell tret el teu tamany es torna Enorme i, quan ho ets, el teu abast incrementa en 5 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Cavaller de Psi
entries: Awake to the poder psiònic within, a Cavaller de Psi is a fighter who augments their physical might with psi-infused weapon strikes, telekinetic lashes, and barriers of mental force. Many githyanki train to become such knights, as do some of the most disciplined high elves. In the world of Athas, renowned gladiators in the arenas of the Sorcerer-Kings are often Cavaller de Psis, and in Eberron, the psionic kalashtar view membership in this knighthood as a special honor.

As a Cavaller de Psi, you might have honed your psionic abilities through solo discipline, unlocked it under the tutelage of a master, or refined it at an academy dedicated to wielding the mind's power as both weapon and shield.

entries.subclassFeature: Opcions de Talent Psiònic|Guerrer||Cavaller de Psi (UA)|UA2020PsionicOptionsRevisited|3
Canviar el Tamany del Dau|Guerrer||Cavaller de Psi (UA)|UA2020PsionicOptionsRevisited|3

subclassFeature.name: Canviar el Tamany del Dau
entries: If you roll the highest number on el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, it es redueix un tamany after the roll. This represents you burning through your psionic energy. For example, if the die is a {@dice d6} and you roll a 6, it becomes a {@dice d4}. If it's a {@dice d4} and you roll a 4, it becomes unusable fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

Conversely, if you roll a 1 on el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, it increases by one die size after the roll, up to its starting size. This represents you conserving psionic energy for later use. For example, if you roll a 1 on a {@dice d4}, the die then becomes a {@dice d6}.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic resets to its starting size. Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, the starting size of el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic increases: a nivell 5 ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}).

subclassFeature.name: Recàrrega Psi
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can calm your mind for a moment and restore el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic to its starting size. You then can't use Recàrrega Psi again fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Talent Psiònic
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller de Psi a nivell 3}

You harbor a wellspring of poder psiònic within yourself, an energy that ebbs and flows as you channel it in various ways. This power is represented by el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, the starting size of which is a {@dice d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Opcions de Talent Psiònic
entries: You can use el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic in the following ways:

items.name: Escut Protector.
items.entry: When you or another creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu takes damage, pots, com a reacció, roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic and reduce the damage taken by the number rolled plus el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (reducció mínima d'1), as you create a momentary shield of telekinetic force.

items.name: Salt de Psi.
items.entry: When you make a high or long jump, you can roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic and extend the distance of the jump, up to a number of feet equal to twice the number rolled plus twice el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 extra foot). This extra distance costs you only 1 foot of movement.

items.name: Telekinetic Strike.
items.entry: You can propel your attacks with telekinetic force. Un cop a cada torn teu, immediately after you deal damage to a target a 30 peus de tu with a weapon attack, you can roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic and also deal force damage to the target equal to the number rolled.

subclassFeature.name: Adepte Telequinètic
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller de Psi a nivell 7}
You have mastered new ways to use your telequinesi:

items.name: Psionic Thrust.
items.entry: When you deal damage to a target with the Telekinetic Strike of your Talent Psiònic, you can force the target to make a Força saving throw (la CD és 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. Unless the save succeeds, you can knock the target {@condition prone} or move it fins a 10 peus en qualsevol direcció horizontally.

items.name: Moviment Telequinètic.
items.entry: If el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic is available, you can move an object or a creature with your mind. Com a acció, you target one loose object that is Large or smaller or one willing creature, (excepte tu). If que puguis veure the target and it is a 30 peus de tu, you can move it fins a 30 peus en un espai desocupat que puguis veure. Alternatively, if it is a Tiny object, you can move it to or from your hand. Either way, you can move the target horizontally, vertically, or both. When you take this action, el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic es redueix un tamany.

subclassFeature.name: Psi-Enhanced Metabolism
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller de Psi a nivell 10}
The psionic energy flowing through you has bolstered your mind and body. You have resistance to poison and psychic damage, and you are immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

subclassFeature.name: Fortalesa de Força
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller de Psi a nivell 15}

You can shield yourself and others with telekinetic force. Com a acció bonus, you can choose creatures, which can include you, que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, up to a number of creatures equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'una). Each of les criatures designades is protected by half cover durant 1 minut o fins que et quedis {@condition incapacitated}. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, unless you decrease el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic by one die size to use this feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Mestratge Telekinètic
entries: {@i tret de Cavaller de Psi a nivell 18}

Your ability to move creatures and objects with your mind is matched by few. If el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic is available, you can cast the {@spell telequinesi} spell, requiring no components. Your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for the spell is Intel·ligència. When you cast this spell, el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic es redueix un tamany.

subclassFeature.name: Arquer Arcà
entries: An Arquer Arcà studies a unique elven method of archery that weaves magic into attacks to produce supernatural effects. Among elves, Arquer Arcàs are some of their most elite warriors. These archers stand watch over the fringes of elven domains, keeping a keen eye out for trespassers and using magic-infused arrows to defeat monsters and invaders before they can reach elven settlements. Over the centuries, the methods of these elf archers have been learned by members of other races who can also balance arcane aptitude with archery.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Arrow
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you learn to channel magic into your attacks with a longbow or shortbow.

entries.name: Create Fletxa Màgica
entries: Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can create one fletxa màgica in your hand. The arrow lasts fins el final del torn or until it hits or misses a target. You can fire the arrow from a shortbow or longbow. The arrow is a magic weapon that deals an additional {@damage 2d6} de dany de força on a hit.
You have two uses of this feature, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

entries.name: Tir Arcà
entries: When you gain this feature, you learn two Opcions de Tir Arcà (escull) (see the Tir Arcàs section below). Whenever you create a fletxa màgica with this feature, you can apply the benefits of one of your Opcions de Tir Arcà to that arrow.
You gain an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional (escull) at 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level.

subclassFeature.name: Tir Arcàs
entries: The Arcane Arrow feature lets you choose Opcions de Tir Arcà at certain levels. The options are presented here in alphabetical order. These are all magical effects.

subclassFeature.name: Archer's Lore
entries: A nivell 3, you learn a few skills relating to the typical duties of an Arquer Arcà. You learn to understand magical theory and develop survival skills for wandering the wilds.
You gain proficiency in two of the following skills (escull): {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, i {@skill Survival}.

subclassFeature.name: Conjure Arrows
entries: A nivell 7, you learn a minor but useful magical trick. Com a acció, you can conjure 20 nonmagical arrows. The arrows appear in your hand or in a container, such as a quiver, on your body. The arrows remain durant 10 minuts or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret; they then vanish.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 7, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 10, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Ever-Ready Arrow
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you can conjure forth a magic-infused arrow more often than before. One minute after expending your last remaining use of Arcane Arrow, you regain one use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 15, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Arrow
entries: A nivell 18, your Arcane Arrow's bonus damage increases to {@damage 4d6} de dany de força.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 18, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Knight
entries: The Knight is a colossus on the battlefield who can shrug off attacks and protect allies from harm. Knights fight from the saddle when they can, and in combat they are expected to seek out and lock down the mightiest of the enemy's forces. On adventures, they are the armored baluard that strives to keep the rest of the party safe.

subclassFeature.name: Nèixer a la Sella
entries: Començant a nivell 3, mounting or dismounting a creature costs you only 5 feet of movement, rather than half your speed. A més, tens avantatge a saving throws made to avoid falling off your mount. If you fall off it, you can automatically land on your feet if you aren't {@condition incapacitated} and you fall less than 10 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable Mark
entries: A nivell 3, you excel at foiling attacks and protecting your allies by menacing your foes. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat cos a cos, the target is marked by you fins el final del teu proper torn. A creature ignores this effect if the creature can't be {@condition frightened}.
The marked target impacta amb desavantatge against a creature other than you or someone else who marked it.

If a target marked by you is a 5 peus de tu on its turn and it moves at least 1 foot or makes an attack that suffers disadvantage from this feature, you can fer un atac armat cos a cos against it using your reaction. This attack roll has advantage, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals extra damage to the target equal to el teu nivell de guerrer.

You can make this special attack even if you have already expended your reaction this round, but not if you have already used your reaction this turn. You can make this attack three times, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Noble Cavalry
entries: A nivell 7, you gain proficiency in two of the following skills (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Persuasion}, or {@skill Religion}. Alternativament, aprèns un idioma (escull).

subclassFeature.name: D'Ací no Passen
entries: A nivell 10, you master the ability to harass and slow your enemies. Com a reacció when a creature moves at least 1 foot a 5 peus de tu, you can fer un atac armat cos a cos contra aquella criatura. If you hit, the attack's weapon deals extra damage to the target equal to la meitat del teu nivell de guerrer, and the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Assalt Cèlere
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you learn to trade accuracy for swift strikes. If tens avantatge a a weapon attack against a target en el teu torn, you can forgo that advantage to immediately make an additional weapon attack against the same target com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Defender's Blade
entries: A nivell 18, you respond to danger with extraordinary vigilance. You can use your reaction for an opportunity attack even if you have already expended your reaction this round, but not if you have already used your reaction this turn.
A més, tens +1 a la CA while wearing heavy armor.

subclassFeature.name: Samurai
entries: The Samurai is a fighter who draws on an implacable esperit de lluita to overcome enemies. A Samurai's willpower is nearly unbreakable, and the enemies in a Samurai's path have two choices: yield or die fighting.

subclassFeature.name: Esperit de Lluita
entries: Començant a nivell 3, the might of your willpower can shield you and help you strike true. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can give yourself two benefits: advantage on all attack rolls and resistance to dany contundent, tallant, i perforant. These benefits last fins el final del teu proper torn.
Pots emprar aquest tret 3 cops. En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Curteig Elegant
entries: Començant a nivell 7, your discipline and attention to detail allow you to excel in social situations that require strict adherence to etiquette. You can add el teu modificador de Saviesa to any Carisma check you make to persuade or please a noble or anyone else of high social station.
You also gain proficiency in the {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, or {@skill Persuasion} (choose one). Alternativament, aprèns un idioma (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Unbreakable Will
entries: A nivell 10, your superior willpower allows you to shrug off mind-assaulting effects. Tens competència en salvades de Saviesa. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency in Intel·ligència or Carisma saving throws (choose one).

subclassFeature.name: Assalt Cèlere
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you learn to trade accuracy for swift strikes. If tens avantatge a a weapon attack against a target en el teu torn, you can forgo that advantage to immediately make an additional weapon attack against the same target com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Força davant la Mort
entries: Començant a nivell 18, your esperit de lluita can delay the grasp of death. If you take damage that would reduce you to 0 punts de vida, you can delay that damage and immediately take a bonus turn, interrupting the current turn. You don't take the damage until the bonus turn ends. It is possible to do things, such as gaining resistance, that change how much of that damage you take.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Sharpshooter
entries: The Sharpshooter is a master of ranged combat. An excellent sniper and eagle-eyed scout, this fighter is a perilous foe who can defeat an entire war band so long as they are kept at range.

subclassFeature.name: Punt de Mira
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, your aim becomes deadly. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can take careful aim at a creature que puguis veure that is within range of a ranged weapon you're wielding. Until the end of this turn, your atacs a distància with that weapon gain two benefits against the target:

items: The attacks ignore half and three-quarters cover.
On each hit, the weapon deals additional damage to the target equal to 2 + la meitat del teu nivell de guerrer.

entries: Pots emprar aquest tret 3 cops. En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Careful Eyes
entries: Començant a nivell 7, you excel at picking out hidden enemies and other threats. pots, com a acció bonus, prendre l'acció {@action Cerca}.
You also gain proficiency in the {@skill Perception}, {@skill Investigation}, or {@skill Survival} (choose one).

subclassFeature.name: Close-Quarters Shooting
entries: A nivell 10, you learn to handle yourself in close combat. Making a atac a distància roll while within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose disadvantage on your roll.
A més, if you hit a creature a 5 peus de tu amb un atac a distància en el teu torn, that creature can't take reactions until the end of this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Assalt Cèlere
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you learn to trade accuracy for swift strikes. If tens avantatge a a weapon attack against a target en el teu torn, you can forgo that advantage to immediately make an additional weapon attack against the same target com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Snap Shot
entries: Començant a nivell 18, you are ever ready to spring into action. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} on your first turn of a combat, you can make one additional atac armat a distància as part of that action.

subclassFeature.name: Guerrer de Runes
entries: You discovered how to enhance your martial prowess using the supernatural power of runes. The ancient practice of rune magic originated with giants. {@i Skiltgravr} ("rune cutters") can be found among any type of giants, and you likely learned your methods first or second hand from such a mystical artisan. Whether you found the giant's work carved into a hill or cave, learned of the runes from a traveling sage, or met the giant in person, you studied the giant's craft. In time, you learned how to carve and apply runes to your equipment and how to invoke their magic, ultimately becoming a Guerrer de Runes.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 3}
Tens competència amb {@item smith's eines|PHB}, and you learn to speak, read, and write {@language Giant}.

subclassFeature.name: Giant Might
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 3}
You can imbue yourself with the might of giants. Com a acció bonus, you magically gain the following benefits, which last durant 1 minut:

items: If you are smaller than Large, you become Large, along with anything you are wearing. If you lack the room to become Large, your size doesn't change.
Tens avantatge a tirades i salvades de Força.
Your weapon attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} damage.

entries: You can use this feature twice, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Rune Magic
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 3}

You learn how to use runes to enhance your gear. When you gain this feature, you learn how to inscribe two runes (escull) on weapons, armor, or shields (see "{@filter Rune Options|optionalfeatures|feature type=RN|source=UAFighterRangerRogue}").

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch a number of objects equal to the number of runes you know, and you inscribe a different rune onto each of the objects. To be eligible, an object must be a weapon, a suit of armor, or a shield.
Your rune remains on an object fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, and an object can bear only one of your runes.
Each time you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace one rune you know with a different one.

subclassFeature.name: Rune Options
entries: Here are rune options for the Rune Magic feature. They are all magical effects. If a rune requires a saving throw, your Rune Magic save DC equals 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Defensive Runes
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 7}

You learn to invoke your rune magic to protect your allies. When another creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu is hit by an attack roll, pots, com a reacció, grant a bonus to the creature's AC against that attack. The bonus equals 1 + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (minimum of +2).
A més, you learn one new rune (escull) from the Rune Magic feature (for a total of three).

subclassFeature.name: Gran Estatura
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 10}

The magic of your runes permanently alters you. When you gain this feature, roll  {@dice 3d4}. You grow a number of inches in height equal to the roll. Moreover, the extra damage you deal with your Giant Might feature increases to  {@dice 1d8}.
A més, you learn one new rune (escull) from your Rune Magic feature (for a total of four).

subclassFeature.name: Rune Magic Mastery
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 15}
You can invoke each rune you know from your Rune Magic feature twice, rather than once, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
A més, you learn one new rune (escull) from the Rune Magic feature (for a total of five).

subclassFeature.name: Blessing of the All Father
entries: {@i tret de Guerrer de Runes a nivell 18}

You learn how to share your rune magic with your allies. Quan empris el tret Giant Might, you can choose one willing creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. La criatura designada also gains the benefits of your Giant Might feature.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Warrior
entries: Awakening to the poder psiònic within themselves, a Psychic Warrior is a fighter who augments their physical might with psychically infused weapon strikes, telekinetic lashes, and barriers of mental force.

As a Psychic Warrior, you might have honed your psionic abilities through your own disciplined practice, unlocked it under the tutelage of a master, or developed it at an academy dedicated to wielding the mind's power as both weapon and shield.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Armament
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 3}

You can channel your psychic power to magically augment your prowess. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, choose whether to augment your defenses or your strikes. The chosen benefit lasts fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Augmented Defenses
entries: When you or a creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu takes damage, pots, com a reacció, roll a {@dice d10} and reduce the amount of damage taken by the number rolled. Quan arribes a nivell 10 en aquesta classe, the die changes to a {@dice d12}.

entries.name: Augmented Strikes
entries: Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can also deal {@damage 1d4} de dany psíquic to that target. Quan arribes a nivell 10 en aquesta classe, the psychic damage increases to {@dice 1d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Hand
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 3}

aprèns el truc {@spell mà de mag}. You can cast it without components, and you can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}. La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs per a aquest conjur és Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Força of Mind
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 7}

Com a acció bonus, you can telekinetically lash out at a creature que puguis veure a 20 peus de tu. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força (la CD és 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. Si falla, L'objectiu rep force damage equal to {@dice 2d6} plus el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència and is telekinetically moved 15 feet directly toward or away from you (escull). On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't moved.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Armament Improvement
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 10}
Quan arribes a nivell 10 en aquesta classe, your Augmented Defenses dice increases to {@dice 1d12}, and your Augmented Strikes dice increases to a {@dice d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Baluard
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 10}

Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can forgo one of your attacks to project a bastion of poder psiònic in a 10-foot radius around yourself. It dura 1 minut o fins que et quedis {@condition incapacitated}. For the duration, you and your allies in that area gain the benefits of half cover and have advantage on Força saving throws.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg or until after you use your Descans Instantani feature.

subclassFeature.name: Agonizing Strikes
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 15}

Your attacks can channel psychic agony. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can also deal {@damage 2d10} de dany psíquic to that target and force it to make a Constitució saving throw (la CD és 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. Unless the save succeeds, the target falls {@condition prone}, and it suffers disadvantage on ability checks fins el final del teu proper torn.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Dreadnaught
entries: {@i tret de Psychic Warrior a nivell 18}

The power of your mind suffuses your entire being, making you a nigh-unstoppable force on the battlefield. Using your reaction when you take damage, you can give yourself the following benefits durant 1 minut o fins que et quedis {@condition incapacitated}:

items: At the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 punts de vida.
La teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 10 peus.
If you're {@condition prone}, you can stand up by spending 5 feet of movement.

entries: Once you activate this feature, you can't use it again fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Hunter
entries: As an archetypal Monster Hunter, you are an expert at defeating supernatural threats. Typically mentored by an older, experienced Monster Hunter, you learn to overcome a variety of unnatural defenses and attacks, including those of undead, lycanthropes, and other creatures of horror.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain proficiency in two of the following skills (escull): {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Perception}. You can choose to gain proficiency with {@item eines de lladre|phb} in place of one skill choice.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica
entries: A nivell 3, you gain a set of abilities that are fueled by special dice called daus de superioritat.

entries.name: Daus de superioritat
entries: You have four daus de superioritat, que són {@dice d8}s. Un dau de superioritat is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended daus de superioritat when you finish a long or short rest. Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 7 and one more a nivell 15.

entries.name: Using Daus de superioritat
entries: You can expend daus de superioritat to gain a number of different benefits:

items: When you make a weapon attack against a creature, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the attack roll. You can use this ability before or after making the attack roll, but before any of the effects of the attack are applied.

When you damage a creature with a weapon attack, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the damage roll. You can use this ability after rolling damage. If the attack causes the target to make a Constitució saving throw to maintain concentration, it has disadvantage on that save.

When you make an Intel·ligència, a Saviesa, or a Carisma saving throw, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the roll. Només pots emprar aquest tret before you learn if the save succeeded or failed.

When you make a Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) to detect a hidden creature or object, or a Saviesa ({@skill Insight}) to determine if someone is lying to you, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the roll. You can use this feature after seeing the total but before learning if you succeeded or failed.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter's Mysticism
entries: A nivell 3, your study of the supernatural gives you a limited ability to use magic. Pots llançar el conjur {@spell detect magic} as a ritual. Pots llançar el conjur {@spell protection from evil and good}, but you cannot cast it again with this feature fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. Saviesa is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for these spells.
A més, you gain the ability to speak one of the following languages (escull): {@language Abyssal}, {@language Celestial}, or {@language Infernal}.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: A nivell 7, whenever you expend daus de superioritat to add to a damage roll, you can expend up to two dice instead of just one, adding both to the roll. Both dice are expended as normal. If the target of your attack is an aberration, a fey, a fiend, or an undead, you deal maximum damage with both dice, instead of rolling them.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 10, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d10}s. A nivell 18, they turn into {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable
entries: Començant a nivell 15, quan tires per iniciativa and have no daus de superioritat remaining, you regain 1 dau de superioritat.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 18, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Genet
entries: The archetypal Genet excels at mounted combat. Usually born to nobility and raised in a royal court, a Genet is equally at home leading a cavalry charge or exchanging witty repartee at a state dinner.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain proficiency in two of the following skills (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. You can choose to gain one tool proficiency in place of one skill proficiency.

subclassFeature.name: Nèixer a la Sella
entries: A nivell 3, tens avantatge a saving throws made to avoid falling off your mount. If you fall off your mount, you always land on your feet if you are capable of taking actions. Mounting or dismounting a creature costs you only 5 feet of movement, rather than half your speed.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica
entries: A nivell 3, you gain a set of abilities that are fueled by special dice called daus de superioritat.

entries.name: Daus de superioritat
entries: You have four daus de superioritat, que són {@dice d8}s. Un dau de superioritat is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended daus de superioritat quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 7 and one more a nivell 15.

entries.name: Using Daus de superioritat
entries: You can expend daus de superioritat to gain a number of different benefits:

items: When you make a check to influence or control a creature you are riding, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the check. You apply this bonus after making the check but before learning if it was successful.

When you make a weapon attack against a creature, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the attack roll. You can use this ability before or after making the attack roll, but before any of the effects of the attack are applied.

When you make an attack with a lance while mounted, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to your damage roll. A més, the target of the attack ha de salvar per Força (CD 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador de Força). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}.

If either you or your mount is hit by an attack while you are mounted, pots gastar un dau de superioritat com a reacció, adding the number rolled to your or your mount's AC. If the attack still hits, you or your mount take half damage from it.

subclassFeature.name: Càrrega Violenta
entries: A nivell 7, you gain additional benefits when you use daus de superioritat to increase your damage when you attack with a lance. You can expend up to two daus de superioritat on the attack, adding both to the damage roll. If you spend two dice, the target has disadvantage on its Força saving throw to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 10, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d10}s. A nivell 18, they turn into {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable
entries: Començant a nivell 15, quan tires per iniciativa and have no daus de superioritat remaining, you regain 1 dau de superioritat.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 18, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Scout
entries: The archetypal Scout excels at finding safe passage through dangerous regions. Scouts usually favor light armor and ranged weapons, but they are comfortable using heavier gear when faced with intense fighting.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain proficiency in three of the following skills (escull): {@skill Acrobatics}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}. You can choose to gain proficiency with {@item eines de lladre|phb} in place of one skill choice.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica
entries: A nivell 3, you gain a set of abilities that are fueled by special dice called daus de superioritat.

entries.name: Daus de superioritat
entries: You have four daus de superioritat, que són {@dice d8}s. Un dau de superioritat is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended daus de superioritat when you finish a long or short rest. Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 7 and one more a nivell 15.

entries.name: Using Daus de superioritat
entries: You can expend daus de superioritat to gain a number of different benefits:

items: When you make a check that allows you to apply your proficiency in {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to bolster the check. Add half the number rolled on the dau de superioritat (rounding up) to your check. You apply this bonus after making the check but before learning if it was successful.

When you make a weapon attack against a creature, pots gastar un dau de superioritat to add it to the attack roll. You can use this ability before or after making the attack roll, but before any of the effects of the attack are applied.

If you are hit by an attack while wearing light or medium armor, pots gastar un dau de superioritat com a reacció, adding the number rolled to your AC. If the attack still hits, you take half damage from it.

subclassFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. Choose one type of favored terrain: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, or the Sotafoscor. When you make an Intel·ligència or Saviesa check related to your favored terrain, el teu bonus de competència is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.
While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, reps els beneficis següents:

items: Difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel.
Your group can't become lost except by magical means.
Even when you are engaged in another activity while traveling (such as foraging, navigating, or tracking), you remain alert to danger.
If you are traveling alone, you can move stealthily at a normal pace.
When you forage, you find twice as much food as you normally would.
While tracking other creatures, you also learn their exact number, their sizes, and how long ago they passed through the area.

entries: You choose additional favored terrain types at 7th and 15th level.

subclassFeature.name: Dau de superioritat adicional
entries: Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 7.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 10, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d10}s. A nivell 18, they turn into {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Dau de superioritat adicional
entries: Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 15.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable
entries: Començant a nivell 15, quan tires per iniciativa and have no daus de superioritat remaining, you regain 1 dau de superioritat.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 18, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Genet v2
entries: The archetypal Genet excels at mounted combat. Usually born among the nobility and raised at court, a Genet is equally at home leading a cavalry charge or exchanging repartee at a state dinner. Genets also learn how to guard those in their charge from harm, often serving as the protectors of their superiors and of the weak. Drawn to right wrongs or earn prestige, many of these fighters leave their lives of comfort to embark on glorious adventure.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, obténs competència en una de les habilitat següents (escull): {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. Alternativament, aprèns un idioma (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Nèixer a la Sella
entries: Començant a nivell 3, your mastery as a rider becomes apparent. Tens avantatge a saving throws made to avoid falling off your mount. If you fall off your mount and descend no more than 10 feet, you can land on your feet if you're not {@condition incapacitated}.
Finally, mounting or dismounting a creature costs you only 5 feet of movement, rather than half your speed.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica
entries: A nivell 3, you gain a set of combat abilities, referred to as maniobres, which are fueled by special dice called daus de superioritat.

entries.name: Daus de superioritat
entries: You have four daus de superioritat, que són {@dice d8}s. Un dau de superioritat is expended when you use it. You regain all your expended daus de superioritat quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 7 and one more a nivell 15.

entries.name: Maniobres
entries: You spend your daus de superioritat on your maniobres. You can use more than one maneuver per turn, but no more than one maneuver per attack. You know the maniobres detailed under "Maniobres" below.

subclassFeature.name: Maniobres
entries: The maniobres are presented in alphabetical order.

subclassFeature.name: Càrrega Violenta
entries: A nivell 7, you gain additional benefits when you use your Maniobra d'Entrebanc maneuver. You can expend up to two daus de superioritat on it, adding both dice to the damage roll. When you spend two dice in this way, the target has disadvantage on its Força saving throw to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 10, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d10}s. A nivell 18, they turn into {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Implacable
entries: Començant a nivell 15, quan tires per iniciativa and have no daus de superioritat remaining, you regain one dau de superioritat.

subclassFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica Millorada
entries: A nivell 18, els teus daus de superioritat es tornen {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Arquer Arcà v2
entries: An Arquer Arcà studies a unique elven method of archery that weaves magic into attacks to produce supernatural effects. Among elves, Arquer Arcàs are some of their most elite warriors. These archers stand watch over the fringes of elven domains, keeping a keen eye out for trespassers and using magic-infused arrows to defeat monsters and invaders before they can reach elven settlements. Over the centuries, the methods of these elf archers have been learned by members of other races who can also balance arcane aptitude with archery.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Arrow
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to unleash special magical effects with some of your shots. When you gain this feature, you learn two Opcions de Tir Arcà (escull) (see the "Opcions de Tir Arcà" section below).

Un cop per torn when you fire a fletxa màgica from a shortbow or longbow com a part de l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can apply one of your Opcions de Tir Arcà to that arrow. You decide to use the option when the arrow hits, unless the option doesn't involve an attack roll. You have two uses of this ability, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
You gain an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level. A més, totes les opcions milloren quan et tornes un guerrer de nivell 18.

subclassFeature.name: Tir Arcà
entries: The Tir Arcà feature lets you choose options for it at certain levels. The options are presented here in alphabetical order. They are all magical effects, and each one is associated with one of the schools of magic.
If an option requires a saving throw, your Tir Arcà save DC equals 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Archer's Lore
entries: A nivell 3, you learn magical theory or some of the secrets of nature—typical for practitioners of this elven martial tradition. You gain proficiency in either the {@skill Arcana} or {@skill Nature}.

subclassFeature.name: Fletxa Màgica
entries: Quan esculls aquest arquetip a nivell 3, you gain the ability to infuse arrows with magic. Whenever you fire a nonmagical arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can make it a fletxa màgica, with a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls. The magic fades from the arrow immediately after it hits or misses its target.

subclassFeature.name: Tir amb Rosca
entries: A nivell 7, you learn how to direct an errant arrow toward a new target. When you make an attack roll with a fletxa màgica and miss, pots, com a acció bonus, to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 7, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 10, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.

subclassFeature.name: Preparació Arquera
entries: Començant a nivell 15, your magical archery is ever available to you when you need it most. Si tires iniciativa ihave no uses of Tir Arcà remaining, you regain one use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Tir Arcà
entries: A nivell 15, you learn an opció de Tir Arcà Adicional.
